name: Vaxolus
description:
Emreki Web Page Vaxolus Page Youtube Channel
It is normal to encounter bugs in the game. Because it’s my 2nd game and I’m improving myself with these projects.

Destroy the enemies you encounter with your vehicle.
As you destroy the enemies, improve your vehicle and become stronger!

Genre: War/Action 
Download Size: 316 MB 
Installed Size: 845 MB
Price: Free
Platform: Windows 10, Windows 11 (Other versions not tested.)
Language: English and Turkish
